history.reason: Major structural updates: backend migration, decision layer integration, startup/runtime contract changes
TUI: add bottom-left version label and startup checklist grid layout
Startup git-tag updater with TUI update-progress flow and auto-restart
Fix startup GitHub token persistence and reuse/change prompt
Fix startup updater loop by normalizing release version files after stash pop
Fix launcher token prompt behavior in non-interactive mode and when env token is pre-set
Fix startup updater partial-apply behavior by normalizing tracked non-runtime files after stash pop
Major optimization release: runtime persistence batching, startup latency improvements, plugin/API efficiency, script consolidation, and cleanup
Major V7 release: autonomous governance, safety gates, tested-apply orchestration, runtime policy closed-loop, and governance APIs
Bug fix: updater now detects version file inconsistencies and triggers update when setup.cfg and version_tally.json disagree
Enhancement: updater now verifies and auto-repairs missing/divergent files from remote tag (concrete, complete sync)
